channel.title: Client and source question
channel.description: hello i dont know how to change anything in the source or client, like when i run server/source and login on my ip it says welcome to (and server thats not mine) and then it has these random server pop up's that say (all vote at and the link) (and allso it has like please visit our website at www.and the link) if some 1 could tv me and help me that would be great or just help me here XD

item.title: Client and source question
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

This is source sided. Btw look in client.java and type ctrl+F and search for the thing you want to change. Once done, compile, restart the server, shazam. If you have any questions for the compiler post it here:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars
